00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::SetsAssignedToUser;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::SetsAssignedToUsers - List and edit which
00023 sets are assigned to a given user.
00024 
00025 =cut
00026 
00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00030 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00031 use WeBWorK::Debug;
00032 
00033 sub initialize {
00034     my ($self)     = @_;
00035     my $r          = $self->r;
00036     my $urlpath    = $r->urlpath;   
00037     my $db         = $r->db;
00038     my $authz      = $r->authz;
00039 
00040     my $userID     = $urlpath->arg("userID");
00041     my $user       = $r->param("user");
00042     
00043     # check authorization
00044     return unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00045     return unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "assign_problem_sets");
00046     
00047     # get the global user, if there is one
00048     my $globalUserID = "";
00049     $globalUserID = $db->{set}->{params}->{globalUserID}
00050         if ref $db->{set} eq "WeBWorK::DB::Schema::GlobalTableEmulator";
00051     
00052     if (defined $r->param("assignToAll")) {
00053         $self->assignAllSetsToUser($userID);
00054         debug("assignAllSetsToUser($userID)");
00055         $self->addmessage(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithoutError'}, "User has been assigned to all current sets."));
00056         debug("done assignAllSetsToUsers($userID)");
00057     } elsif (defined $r->param('unassignFromAll') and defined($r->param('unassignFromAllSafety')) and $r->param('unassignFromAllSafety')==1) {
00058         if ($userID ne $globalUserID) {
00059           $self->addmessage(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithoutError'}, "User has been unassigned from all sets."));
00060             $self->unassignAllSetsFromUser($userID);
00061         }
00062     } elsif (defined $r->param('assignToSelected')) {
00063         # get list of all sets and a hash for checking selectedness
00064         # DBFIXME shouldn't need to get set list, should use iterator
00065         my @setIDs = $db->listGlobalSets;
00066         my @setRecords = grep { defined $_ } $db->getGlobalSets(@setIDs);
00067         my %selectedSets = map { $_ => 1 } $r->param("selected");
00068         
00069         # get current user
00070         my $User = $db->getUser($userID); # checked
00071         die "record not found for $userID.\n" unless $User;
00072         
00073         $self->addmessage(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithoutError'}, "User's sets have been reassigned."));
00074         
00075         unless ($User->user_id eq $globalUserID) {
00076         
00077             my %userSets = map { $_ => 1 } $db->listUserSets($userID);
00078             
00079             # go through each possible set
00080             foreach my $setRecord (@setRecords) {
00081                 my $setID = $setRecord->set_id;
00082                 # does the user want it to be assigned to the selected user
00083                 if (exists $selectedSets{$setID}) {
00084                     unless ($userSets{$setID}) {    # skip users already in the set
00085                         debug("assignSetToUser($userID, $setID)");
00086                         $self->assignSetToUser($userID, $setRecord);
00087                         debug("done assignSetToUser($userID, $setID)");
00088                     }
00089                 } else {
00090                     # user asked to NOT have the set assigned to the selected user
00091                     next unless $userSets{$setID};  # skip users not in the set
00092                     $db->deleteUserSet($userID, $setID);
00093                 }
00094             }
00095         }
00096     } elsif (defined $r->param("unassignFromAll")) {
00097        # no action taken
00098        $self->addmessage(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'}, "No action taken"));
00099     }
00100 }
00101 
00102 sub getUserName {
00103     my ($self, $pathUserName) = @_;
00104     
00105     if (ref $pathUserName eq "HASH") {
00106         $pathUserName = undef;
00107     }
00108     
00109     return $pathUserName;
00110 }

00113 
00114 sub body {
00115     my ($self)      = @_;
00116     my $r           = $self->r;
00117     my $urlpath     = $r->urlpath;
00118     my $db          = $r->db;
00119     my $ce          = $r->ce;
00120     my $authz       = $r->authz;
00121     my $courseName  = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00122     my $webworkRoot = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00123     my $userID      = $urlpath->arg("userID");
00124     
00125     my $user        = $r->param('user');
00126     my $setsAssignedToUserPage    = $urlpath->newFromModule($urlpath->module, $r, 
00127                                                             courseID =>  $courseName,
00128                                                             userID=>$userID
00129     );
00130     my $setsAssignedToUserURL     = $self->systemLink($setsAssignedToUserPage,authen=>0);
00131 
00132     # check authorization
00133     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to access the Instructor tools."))
00134         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00135     
00136     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to assign homework sets."))
00137         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "assign_problem_sets");
00138     
00139     # get list of sets
00140     # DBFIXME this is a duplicate call! :P :P :P
00141     my @setIDs = $db->listGlobalSets;
00142     my @Sets = $db->getGlobalSets(@setIDs);
00143     
00144 #   # sort first by due date and then by name (this should be replaced with a
00145 #   # call to a standard sorting routine!)
00146 #   @Sets = sort {
00147 #       $a->due_date <=> $b->due_date
00148 #       || lc($a->set_id) cmp lc($b->set_id)
00149 #   } @Sets;
00150 
00151     # Sort by set name only  -- I find this most useful for the instructor pages
00152     @Sets = sort {
00153         lc($a->set_id) cmp lc($b->set_id)
00154     } @Sets;
00155     
00156     
00157     print CGI::start_form({method=>"post", action=>$setsAssignedToUserURL});
00158     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00159     
00160     # get the global user, if there is one
00161     my $globalUserID = "";
00162     $globalUserID = $db->{set}->{params}->{globalUserID}
00163         if ref $db->{set} eq "WeBWorK::DB::Schema::GlobalTableEmulator";
00164     
00165     if ($userID ne $globalUserID) {
00166         print CGI::p(CGI::submit({name=>"assignToAll", value=>"Assign All Sets"}));
00167     }
00168     
00169     print CGI::div({-style=>"color:red"},
00170                "Do not uncheck a set unless you know what you are doing.", CGI::br(),
00171                "There is NO undo for unassigning a set.");
00172 
00173     print CGI::p("When you uncheck a homework set (and save the changes), you destroy all
00174               of the data for that set for this student.   If You then need to
00175               reassign the set and the student will receive new versions of the problems.
00176               Make sure this is what you want to do before unchecking sets."
00177     );
00178                         
00179     print CGI::start_table({});
00180         print CGI::Tr(CGI::th(["Assigned","&nbsp;&nbsp;","Set Name","&nbsp;&nbsp;","Due Date", "&nbsp;"]));
00181         print CGI::Tr(CGI::td([CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr()]));
00182     
00183     foreach my $Set (@Sets) {
00184         my $setID = $Set->set_id;
00185         
00186         # this is true if $Set is assigned to the selected user
00187         # DBFIXME testing for existence -- don't need to fetch record
00188         my $UserSet = $db->getUserSet($userID, $setID); # checked
00189         my $currentlyAssigned = defined $UserSet;
00190         
00191         my $prettyDate;
00192         if ($currentlyAssigned and $UserSet->due_date) {
00193             $prettyDate = $self->formatDateTime($UserSet->due_date);
00194         } else {
00195             $prettyDate = $self->formatDateTime($Set->due_date);
00196         }
00197         
00198         # URL to edit user-specific set data
00199 #       my $url = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root}
00200 #           . "/$courseName/instructor/sets/$setID/?editForUser=$userID&"
00201 #           . $self->url_authen_args();
00202         my $setListPage = $urlpath->new(type =>'instructor_set_detail',
00203                     args =>{
00204                         courseID => $courseName,
00205                         setID    => $setID
00206     });
00207         my $url = $self->systemLink($setListPage,params =>{editForUser => $userID});
00208         print CGI::Tr({}, 
00209                   CGI::td({-align=>"center"},
00210                 ($userID eq $globalUserID
00211                     ? "" # no checkboxes for global user!
00212                     : CGI::checkbox({
00213                         type=>"checkbox",
00214                         name=>"selected",
00215                         checked=>$currentlyAssigned,
00216                         value=>$setID,
00217                         label=>"",
00218                     })
00219                 )),
00220                   CGI::td({}, [ "",
00221                 $setID, "",
00222                 "($prettyDate)", "",
00223                 $currentlyAssigned
00224                     ? CGI::a({href=>$url}, "Edit user-specific set data")
00225                     : (),
00226             ])
00227         );
00228     }
00229         print CGI::Tr(CGI::td([CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr()]));
00230     print CGI::end_table();
00231     print CGI::submit({name=>"assignToSelected", value=>"Save"});
00232 
00233     print CGI::p( CGI::hr(),
00234               CGI::div( {class=>'ResultsWithError'},
00235                 "There is NO undo for this function.  
00236                  Do not use it unless you know what you are doing!  When you unassign
00237                  sets using this button, or by unchecking their set names, you destroy all
00238                  of the data for those sets for this student.",
00239                 CGI::br(),
00240                 CGI::submit({name=>"unassignFromAll", value=>"Unassign All Sets"}),
00241                 CGI::radio_group(-name=>"unassignFromAllSafety", -values=>[0,1], -default=>0, -labels=>{0=>'Read only', 1=>'Allow unassign'}),
00242                   ),
00243                   CGI::hr(),
00244     );
00245 
00246     print CGI::end_form();
00247     
00248     return "";
00249 }
00250 
00251 sub title {  
00252         my ($self) = @_;  
00253         my $r = $self->{r};  
00254         my $userID = $r->urlpath->arg("userID");  
00255   
00256         return "Assigned Sets for user $userID";  
00257 }
